    Method

    static int
    SmartBot.simulate(Card chosenCard, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
    Simulates how many cards would be "kicked" from the parade board if the specified card were played, according to parade rules.
    int[]
    SmarterBot.smarterSimulation(Card chosenCard, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
    Simulates how many cards would be kicked and the total score of those cards if the given card were played.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    Bot.getNextCardIndex(List<Card> hand, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
    Determines the index of the next card the bot will play from its hand.
    int
    RandomBot.getNextCardIndex(List<Card> hand, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
    Selects a random card index from the bot's hand to play.
    int
    SmartBot.getNextCardIndex(List<Card> hand, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
    Selects the best card to play based on minimizing the number of kicked cards.
    int
    SmarterBot.getNextCardIndex(List<Card> hand, ParadeBoard paradeBoard)
    Chooses the best card to play by simulating each option and selecting the one that results in the least number of kicks and lowest score impact.
